modName: R18 Argent Armour for CBBE V3 and UNP RETEXTURE
summary: R18 Argent Armour for CBBE V3 and UNP Retexture
descriptionHtml:
This is a retexture of KURESE´s R18 Argent Armour for CBBE V3 and UNP
-------------------------
My second mod
--------------------------
This time i use completely new High Definition textures to make this mod.

For more infomations watch the original mod at
 http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12424

_________________

It´s a stand alone Mod you dont need the original file to install it

enjoy it


Credits
======================

Thanks to:
Bethesda
KURESE
Caliente
UNP body creator
NEXUS
 ____________________________

UPDATE 

Now with lorefriendly soulderplates and ornaments

i also make this retexture for UPN avaliable
author: Ilias
